en: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig are making a treasure hunt for Peppa and Geroge.
zh: 猪奶奶和猪爷爷正在给佩奇和乔治准备寻宝游戏。

en: Granny Pig is drawing the treasure map.
Grandpa Pig is burying the treasure in a secret place in the garden.
zh: 猪爷爷正在将宝藏藏在花园里的一个秘密地点。

en: Grandpa Pig! Have you finished?!
Peppa and George will be here soon!
zh: 佩奇和乔治很快就来这了！

en: No need to panic, Granny Pig!
Peppa and her family are here!
Quick, Grandpa Pig! They're here!
Almost done!
Grandpa Pig just finished in time!
Granny Pig! We're here!
Hello, my Little ones!
zh: 你们好啊，我的小可爱们！

en: Grandpa Pig!
Ahoy there, me hearties!
Peppa, George, we've made you a treasure hunt!
zh: 佩奇，乔治，我们给你们准备了寻宝活动！

en: Somewhere in the garden is buried treasure!
zh: 花园里的某个地方藏了宝藏哦！

en: Wow! Treasure! Where is it?
You have to look for it.
Here's a treasure map for Peppa.
And George can wear my pirate hat.
zh: 乔治可以戴上我的海盗帽。

en: Ahoy there, Captain George!
The map is a bit difficult.
Daddy, can you help?
Of course, Peppa.
I'm very good with maps.
Er. It is a bit difficult.
Daddy Pig, you're holding the map upside down!
zh: 猪爸爸，你把地图拿反了！

en: Yes, I thought as much.
It's easy! The red cross shows where the treasure is!
zh: 太简单了！红色叉的地方就是宝藏的地方！

en: But where in the garden are those two apple trees?
zh: 但是花园的什么地方有两棵苹果树呢？

en: Hmmm... I don't know.
Would you like a clue?
Yes, please!
The first clue is in a bottle.
zh: 第一个提示在一个瓶子里。

en: But where is the bottle?
I can see it!
Peppa has found the first clue.
zh: 佩奇找到了第一个提示了。

en: A message in a bottle.
Look, everyone! Here's the bottle!
Well done, Peppa!
Let's see what the message says.
zh: 让我们看看纸条上说什么。

en: Oh it's a message from a pirate!
zh: 哦，它是来自海盗的纸条！

en: Mummy? Can you read the pirate's message?
zh: 妈妈？你能帮我念一下海盗纸条吗？

en: Hmm... This pirate has very bad handwriting.
zh: 嗯。。。这个海盗的字写得真难看。

en: The pirate's handwriting is excellent.
zh: 海盗的字写得挺不错的。

en: No, I can't make it out at all.
The pirate has clearly written,"Follow the arrows!"
zh: 海盗写得很清楚，“跟着箭头走！”

en: Follow the arrows?
George has found the second clue!
zh: 乔治找到了第二个提示！

en: Sticks in the shape of an arrow!
Look! They point this way!
Peppa and George are following the arrows.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在跟着箭头走。

en: Look, George! A key!
Peppa has found the next clue. A key!
zh: 佩奇找到了下一个提示。一个钥匙！

en: Well done, Peppa!
Now you just have to find the treasure chest that it unlocks.
zh: 现在你只要找到宝箱，然后打开它。

en: But there aren't any more clues.
zh: 但是没有更多的线索了。

en: Maybe you should take another look at the map.
zh: 也许你应该再看一看地图。

en: Look, Peppa, the map has two apple trees on it.
zh: 看，佩奇，地图上有两棵苹果树。

en: Here's an apple tree!
And here's an apple tree!
So the treasure must be here!
zh: 所以宝藏一定在这里了！

en: Let's take a look!
Oh, dear. There doesn't seem to be anything here...
zh: 哦，天啊。这看起来不像有东西在。。。

en: Hang on! There is something here!
Wow! Treasure!
Hurray!
Well done! Well done!
I've got the key to open it!
Wow! I can't believe it!
Gold coins! They must be worth a fortune!
zh: 居然是金币！它们一定很值钱！

en: It's better than that!
They are not gold coins,
they are chocolate coins!
And there's a chocolate coin for everybody.
zh: 每个人都有巧克力金币。

en: Hurray!
Peppa and George love chocolate coins.
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢巧克力金币。

en: Everyone loves chocolate coins.
zh: 大家都喜欢巧克力金币。

en: Granny, Grandpa,
this is the best treasure hunt ever!
zh: 这是最好玩的寻宝游戏！
